greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangular array T read by rows: T(i,j)=b(i+1)-b(i+1-j); j=1,2,...,i; i=1,2,3,...; b=A004978.
formula: T(n, 1)=least number not in any preceding row and T(n, k)=T(n, 1)+T(n-1, 1)+...+T(n-k+1, 1) for k >= 2.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
